skins.selfIntroduction: I am Tartu of the Vichya Dominion. During the war, I was assigned to the Mediterranean and joined the fight against the Royal Navy. At Toulon, the others and I were... No, I can't get caught up about the past. The important thing is what's now in front of us! That's what Vauquelin would say, hehe.
skins.acquisition: Good day, Commander. I'm Tartu of the Vauquelin-class. ...Huh? Oh, I'm so sorry, I got caught up in thinking about how large the port is...
skins.login: Commander, good day...... Oh, I was deep in thought about why you hadn't shown up yet...
skins.details: The motherly Dunkerque, the elegant Alg¨¦rie, and Lady Richelieu... They all represent the pinnacles of womanhood. I must strive to be more like them.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, do you think I can grow up to become a mature, caring woman like Dunkerque?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Vauquelin, about the donuts last time... Oh, you already heard about that? ...Sorry, I must have gotten lost in my thoughts again...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Vauquelin is really athletic. Getting tired from exercising, resting, and getting hungry... Oh, sorry, I started thinking about Dunkerque's sweets...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, regarding what you asked me earlier... Eh? You've already taken care of it? I, I see...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: According to the book Vauquelin recommended me, what I should do in this situation is... gather the evidence, and... detain the offender?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, you're not going to get into the water? ...Ah, I'm fine right here. To tell you the truth, I once got washed away by the waves, and then got laughed at by Vauquelin... so I'm perfectly fine right here.
skins.acquisition: Commander, you're not going to get into the water? ...Ah, I'm fine right here. To tell you the truth, I once got washed away by the waves, and then got laughed at by Vauquelin... so I'm perfectly fine right here.
skins.login: Oh, Commander, good day. Would you like some ice cream?
skins.details: The book I last read took place on the beach, if I remember properly... It was a murder mystery on the beach, right?
skins.secretaryIdle1: McCall from the Eagle Union and Suffolk from the Royal Navy seem to get along really well. The two of them are pretty funny, hehe.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Vauquelin, I'm not going into the water. I'll just spend a nice, peaceful day on the beach like this.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, aren't you going to change into a swimsuit? ...Um, I'm slightly curious, just a little...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, what's wrong? The ice cream? ...Hyaa?!
